attributes.action: Provide School Children in Primary and Secondary Education with Face Masks
attributes.additional_details: To make sure everyone if safe and anyone with symptoms will have a lower chance of spreading it in schools, even if they do not die from it, their older ancestors and friends may so this will be a pre-cautious manner to make sure it will not spread while it is mutating.
attributes.background: To produce and provide primary schools and secondary schools with Clinical Face Masks to help prevent the spread of Covid 19 when the amount infected hits 500.

rejection.details:
The supply of medical provisions to schools would be a decision for medical professionals and the NHS, and not the Government.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
